events.name: The Rise of Carmilla
events.description: Historically, female vampires were portrayed as predatory lesbians or as subservient to a Master in the form of Dracula. They were the Brides, a means to bring victims to the male vampire. Modernized versions of the Brides have them liberated from any Master and are unconventional women fighting the patriarchy and the 'traditions' that try to keep them submissive. Through the films Bit (2019), Byzantium (2017), and Bliss (2019), we see the full spectrum of these women, we see the Rise of Carmilla.

events.name: A Region of Prisoners
events.description: Join us for a lecture about how to overcome racism and how to gain more allies in the Middle East. We will also discuss incidents where people were sent to jail solely for being suspected of being a Satanist or being LGBTQ+.

events.name: Southern Dandy Ghost
events.description: Join Hadrian Flyte in a decaying Satanic manor from the illuminati golden age of the 1920s for a Southern Dandy Ghost evening.

events.name: Bats in the Belfry!
events.description: Livestreaming your new best friends, bats from BatWorld. Donate at batworld.org

events.name: DJ Kittybot
events.description: Join DJ Kittybot for tunes and a monster mash.

events.name: Grey Faction Satanic Archives
events.description: TSTVHQ's Satanic Archive Library is open all night. Texts courtesy of Center for Inquiry and Grey Faction.
